summary: This is a brief email exchange from June 27, 2019, discussing the list of victims identified in the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in the Epstein case. The key point is that the sender confirms their principal New York victim is not on the list, which appears to contain only Florida victims.

events.title: Email exchange about NPA victim list
events.description: Email correspondence discussing the list of victims from the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement, noting that the principal New York victim is not included and the list appears to contain only Florida victims.

keyFacts: The document references a list of victims in the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) in the Epstein case.
The sender confirms that their principal New York victim is not on the victim list from the NPA side-letter.
The victim list appears to contain only Florida victims, suggesting a geographical limitation in the identified victims covered by the NPA.
